name: Basic Birthday Package
description: A simple and budget-friendly package designed for a small gathering. It includes standard decoration, a classic birthday cake, and party favors to add a special touch to your celebration.
detailed_description: A simple and budget-friendly package designed for a small gathering. It includes standard decoration, a classic birthday cake, and party favors to add a special touch to your celebration.

name: Deluxe Birthday Package
description: Elevate your celebration with our Deluxe Birthday Package. It includes premium decoration, a customized birthday cake, entertainment options like a magician or clown, and party favors to create unforgettable memories.
detailed_description: Elevate your celebration with our Deluxe Birthday Package. It includes premium decoration, a customized birthday cake, entertainment options like a magician or clown, and party favors to create unforgettable memories.

name: Themed Birthday Extravaganza
description: Immerse yourself in a themed world with our Themed Birthday Extravaganza. This package features themed decoration, an elaborate birthday cake, costume characters, engaging games and activities, and party favors to make...
detailed_description: Immerse yourself in a themed world with our Themed Birthday Extravaganza. This package features themed decoration, an elaborate birthday cake, costume characters, engaging games and activities, and party favors to make your birthday unforgettable.

name: Outdoor Adventure Birthday
description: Experience the thrill of an outdoor adventure with our Outdoor Adventure Birthday package. It includes an outdoor venue, exciting activities like zip-lining and treasure hunts......
detailed_description: Experience the thrill of an outdoor adventure with our Outdoor Adventure Birthday package. It includes an outdoor venue, exciting activities like zip-lining and treasure hunts, BBQ catering, and a custom cake for a memorable celebration in the great outdoors.

name: Teenage Birthday Bash
description: Host a cool and fun-filled Teenage Birthday Bash with our specially designed package. It includes teen-friendly decor, a DJ and dance floor, pizza and snacks, a photo booth, and party favors for a birthday party that teenagers will love.
detailed_description: Host a cool and fun-filled Teenage Birthday Bash with our specially designed package. It includes teen-friendly decor, a DJ and dance floor, pizza and snacks, a photo booth, and party favors for a birthday party that teenagers will love.

name: Luxury VIP Birthday Experience
description: Indulge in the ultimate Luxury VIP Birthday Experience. This exclusive package offers a red carpet entrance, VIP lounge, gourmet dining, live entertainment, exclusive decor, and a customized cake for a birthday celebration fit for VIPs.
detailed_description: Indulge in the ultimate Luxury VIP Birthday Experience. This exclusive package offers a red carpet entrance, VIP lounge, gourmet dining, live entertainment, exclusive decor, and a customized cake for a birthday celebration fit for VIPs.
